result.eng: After he had ben living in Germany for two years, his German improved a lot.
result.ga: Tar éis dó cónaí sa Ghearmáin ar feadh dhá bhliain tháinig feabhas mór ar a chuid Gearmáinise
result.orig: Tar éis dó cónaí sa Ghearmáin ar feadh dhá bhliain tháinig feabhas mór ar a chuid Gearmáinise
result.html: Tar éis dó cónaí sa Ghearmáin ar feadh dhá bhliain tháinig feabhas mór ar a chuid GearmáiniseAfter he had ben living in Germany for two years, his German improved a lot.
result.ponchtml: Tar éis dó cónaí sa Ġearmáin ar feaḋ ḋá ḃliain ṫáinig feaḃas mór ar a ċuid GearmáiniseAfter he had ben living in Germany for two years, his German improved a lot.

result.eng: Although he had been living in Germany for two years, his German did not improve at all.
result.ga: Tar éis go raibh sé ina chónaí sa Ghearmáin le dhá bhliain níor tháinig feabhas ar bith ar a chuid Gearmáinise
result.orig: Tar éis go raibh sé ina chónaí sa Ghearmáin le dhá bhliain níor tháinig feabhas ar bith ar a chuid Gearmáinise
result.html: Tar éis go raibh sé ina chónaí sa Ghearmáin le dhá bhliain níor tháinig feabhas ar bith ar a chuid GearmáiniseAlthough he had been living in Germany for two years, his German did not improve at all.
result.ponchtml: Tar éis go raiḃ sé ina ċónaí sa Ġearmáin le ḋá ḃliain níor ṫáinig feaḃas ar biṫ ar a ċuid GearmáiniseAlthough he had been living in Germany for two years, his German did not improve at all.

result.eng: Things were dangerous after the Nazi seizure of power in Germany.
result.ga: Bhí cúrsaí contúirteach tar éis urghabháil chumhachta na Naitsithe sa Ghearmáin
result.orig: Bhí cúrsaí contúirteach tar éis urghabháil chumhachta na Naitsithe sa Ghearmáin
result.html: Bhí cúrsaí contúirteach tar éis urghabháil chumhachta na Naitsithe sa GhearmáinThings were dangerous after the Nazi seizure of power in Germany.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí cúrsaí contúirteaċ tar éis urġaḃáil ċuṁaċta na Naitsiṫe sa ĠearmáinThings were dangerous after the Nazi seizure of power in Germany.

result.eng: Central to the planning was Mohammad Atta, an Egyptian who had devoted himself to Islamic extremism as a student in Germany.
result.ga: Lárnach sa phleanáil bhí Mohammad Atta Éigipteach a chuaigh le hantoisceachas Ioslamach agus é ina mhac léinn sa Ghearmáin
result.orig: Lárnach sa phleanáil bhí Mohammad Atta Éigipteach a chuaigh le hantoisceachas Ioslamach agus é ina mhac léinn sa Ghearmáin
result.html: Lárnach sa phleanáil bhí Mohammad Atta Éigipteach a chuaigh le hantoisceachas Ioslamach agus é ina mhac léinn sa GhearmáinCentral to the planning was Mohammad Atta, an Egyptian who had devoted himself to Islamic extremism as a student in Germany.
result.ponchtml: Lárnaċ sa ṗleanáil ḃí Mohammad Atta Éigipteaċ a ċuaiġ le hantoisceaċas Ioslamaċ agus é ina ṁac léinn sa ĠearmáinCentral to the planning was Mohammad Atta, an Egyptian who had devoted himself to Islamic extremism as a student in Germany.
